issue.title: [Python] Allow using a more modern version of jpype in pyarrow.jvm
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7888](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7888). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently using pyarrow.jvm fails with an error message ArrowType.Int object has not attribute 'isSigned'.

I propose we change those functions to make use of the getters of those fields instead of relying on the private attributes inside those types.
